author: Nick Nairn
method: Place the garlic cloves, olives, olive oil and parsley in a mini food processor and blend until smooth. Heat a grill pan until hot and chargrill the ciabatta slices on both sides. Transfer tapenade to a serving bowl and serve with the chargrilled ciabatta slices.
ingredients: 3 garlic cloves, peeled and chopped,  85g/3oz olives, pits removed, chopped,  4-6 tbsp olive oil,  2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley,  ciabatta, sliced, to serve
